headline: Is Moderna Stock A Sell As RFK Jr. Reportedly Mulls A Massive Funding Pull?
summary: Moderna stock skidded on reports Robert F. Kennedy Jr. is considering pulling funding for its bird flu vaccine. Is MRNA stock a sell?

raw.headline: Is Moderna Stock A Sell As RFK Jr. Reportedly Mulls A Massive Funding Pull?

headline: Citi says SMid biotechs alternative to large caps as it starts coverage
summary: Investing.com -- Citi has expanded its biopharmaceutical research coverage, initiating coverage on seven small- and mid-cap (SMid) biotechnology companies. Citi said SMid biotechs remain an attractive alternative to large-cap pharmaceutical firms, particularly amid healthcare policy uncertainties. Citi initiated coverage with Buy ratings on 89bio (NASDAQ:ETNB), price target $25. Apogee (NASDAQ:APOG), price target $95. Avidity, price target $70, BioNTech (NASDAQ:BNTX), price target $145.
